text: itarkuk karanam, niccayamaka avarkalukku, avarkalutaiya tutarkal telivana attatcikalutan vantu kontutamiruntanar, anal appotu avarkalo, (nam ponra) oru manitara namakku nervali kattuvar?" Enru kuri (avarkalaip pinparruvatai) nirakarittup pin vankik kontarkal, allahvo avarkaliliruntu entat tevaiyumarravan, anriyum allah (evaritamiruntum) tevaiyarravan; pukal mikkavan
